src:
Tartaruga não deve ser um bicho inteligente

01 Nov 2019, 15:54

Como mostramos mais cedo, 74 tartarugas marinhas morreram sufocadas pelo óleo que vazou no litoral nordestino do navio Boubolina.
Provavelmente, o douto secretário de Aquicultura, Jorge Seif Júnior, diria que elas não são tão inteligentes quanto os peixes, que fogem quando veem uma mancha.
Na live ontem com Bolsonaro, ele tentou, com a explicação, tranquilizar os consumidores.
text:
Turtle must not be a smart critter

01 Nov 2019, 15:54

As we showed earlier, 74 sea turtles were choked to death by oil that leaked on the northeastern coast of the Boubolina vessel.
Probably the learned secretary of aquaculture, Jorge Seif Junior, would say that they are not as intelligent as fish, which flee when they see a spot.
On live yesterday with Bolsonaro, he tried, with the explanation, to reassure consumers.
